title: Semantik Architect Frame Schema: Event â€“ Historical / political event
description: Schema for the event.historical frame: semantic representation of historical and political events (revolutions, coups, reforms, transitions of power).

frame_type.description: Canonical frame type identifier for historical / political events.

frame_family.description: Optional high-level family label; always event for this frame.

main_event.description: The core Event object representing the historical event itself.

focal_entity.description: Optional focal entity whose history is being told through this event (e.g. a country, regime, or major organization).

short_label.description: Optional coarse label or lemma describing the event kind (e.g. revolution, coup, independence).

cause_lemmas.description: Coarse cause descriptors in lemma form (e.g. economic_crisis, election_dispute, colonial_rule).

outcome_lemmas.description: Coarse outcome descriptors in lemma form (e.g. independence, regime_change, new_constitution).

precursor_events.description: Important build-up events leading to the main_event.

aftermath_events.description: Immediate aftermath events following the main_event.

attributes.description: Additional structured attributes that do not have dedicated slots (e.g. ideological_context_lemmas, conflict_scale, violence_level, estimated_casualties).

extra.description: Free-form metadata / provenance bag used for round-tripping to upstream schemas (e.g. raw Semantik Architect blobs, Wikidata IDs).

entity.description: Generic entity reference (person, organization, place, etc.).

id.description: Local identifier for the entity, if any.

qid.description: External identifier such as a Wikidata QID.

kind.description: Optional kind label (e.g. person, organization, state).

extra.description: Arbitrary metadata attached to the entity.

location.description: Location reference (city, country, region, venue, etc.).

id.description: Local identifier for the location, if any.

kind.description: Optional kind label (e.g. city, country, region).

extra.description: Arbitrary metadata attached to the location.

timespan.description: Coarse time span with optional year, month, and day fields.

event.description: Generic event reference with type, time, location, and participants.

id.description: Local identifier for the event, if any.

event_type.description: High-level event type label (e.g. coup, revolution, independence_declared).

participants.description: Mapping from role label to entity participant.

extra.description: Arbitrary metadata attached to the event.
